DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study Intensive Early Rheumatoid Arthritis Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment group A 0 - 6 month : Adalimumab 40 mg eow + methotrexate rapidly titrate 20 mg weekly + prednisone 50 mg/d taper 6.25 mg 6 - 12 month : Adalimumab 40 mg eow plus methotrexate 20 mg weekly group B 0 - 6 month : Adalimumab 40 mg eow + methotrexate rapidly titrate 20 mg weekly + placebo 6 - 12 month : Adalimumab 40 mg eow + methotrexate rapidly titrate 20 mg weekly Follow period - Open Label phase : Patients achieve clinical remission treat MTX observe another 12 month period . Patients achieve clinical remission patient experience relapse disease treat accord standard care ( SOC ) modality .
